library(flexdashboard)

# Page 1

## Column

```{r}
basicPage(
  h3("The value in the text box gets printed below with the textOutput function."),
  textInput("mytext", "this is the input box"),
  
  "The value typed is:",
  textOutput("my_text_output")
)
```



```{r}
  txt <- renderText({           #: the function
    return(input$mytext)
  })
  
  output$my_text_output <- txt  #: calling the function
```
